cgcloud__Account_Task_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Account_Task_Template__c
cgcloud__Account_Task_Template__c.description: Represents the details of the customer task template to be used for customer tasks.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: The customer task template is active and can be used for customer task creation.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specific language.

cgcloud__Management_Type__c.description: Describes the kind of management relationship.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: The customer task template that is available for the sales org specified.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Sorting order of the customer task template in the overviews.

cgcloud__User_Roles__c.description: User roles that are required for the user when creating calls based on this template.
